profile.name: Vallerian Dava Dayoh
profile.title: Frontend-Developer
profile.bio: A passionate computer science student who loves exploring web development and programming. I enjoy building creative, responsive, and functional projects using modern technologies like React, TailwindCSS, and Python. Always eager to learn and grow as a developer.

education.description: Focused on web development, data structures, and software architecture
Focused on science subjects including physics, chemistry, and biology, with strong emphasis on analytical thinking and problem solving.
Developed foundational knowledge in mathematics, science, and languages while building discipline, teamwork, and curiosity in learning.

experience.description: Led a full-stack team to design and develop the mytemplate e-commerce website, focusing on the sale of digital design assets (PPT, CV, books, etc.).
achievements: Successfully launched the mytemplate e-commerce website with complete transaction and product catalog features.
Successfully managed a team consisting of 5 developers and designers.
Led the implementation of testing frameworks, resulting in a 40% improvement in code quality and stability.
Integrated a third-party payment system and ensured robust user data security.

experience.description: Coordinated a small sub-team for an internship project focused on designing the User Interface (UI) for the Traveloka application. Responsible for facilitating communication between team members and senior developers.
achievements: Successfully led the design of user-friendly UI prototypes for key Traveloka features.
Ensured that all UI designs were aligned with the established brand guideline principles.
Actively participated in design pitching sessions to senior mentors.
Educated fellow interns on the importance of version control in collaborative design projects.

experience.description: Led the team in developing a To-Do List application using Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles with Python. Fully responsible for architectural design, task distribution, and team member mentoring.
achievements: Successfully led the team to complete the Python OOP-based To-Do List project on time.
Established and ensured the implementation of strict OOP coding standards across the entire team.
Increased team work efficiency by implementing a weekly code review system.
Demonstrated the application to stakeholders and received positive feedback on the design quality.
